content.rendered:
Directed by Mudassar Aziz.

Written by Mudassar Aziz.

Cast Diana Penty(Happy). Abhay Deol(Bilal Ahmed). Jimmy Shergill(Daman Singh Bagga). Ali Fazal(Guddu). Sukhjeevan Randhawa(Pakistani Policeman) . Manoj Bakshi(Zia Rehmani). Tasha Bhambra(Amjad). Lankesh Bhardwaj(Rajinder). Manu Rishi Chadha(Sardar). Gaurav Dixit(Dimpy). Anil Jatav(Dj). Ayesha Raza Mishra(Rifat Bi (as Ayesha Raza)). Piyush Mishra(Usman Afridi). Neetu Pandey(Ishtiyaq Khan (as Neetu Pande)). Jagat Rawat(Fakhru). Rana Pratap Sengar(Rasheed). Ashu Sharma(Winkle). Nilima Sharma(Reeto). Ravi Sharma(Riyaaz). Jawed Sheikh(Javed Ahmed (as Javed Sheikh)). Momal Sheikh(Zoya Rehmani). Kanwaljeet Singh(Papa Ji (Happy’s Father) (as Kanwaljit Singh)). Surjeet Singh(Moin)

Language Hindi.

Producers Nitin Dalvi. ChandraPrakash Dubey. Mohammad S. Hyderabadwala. Jitender. Krishika Lulla. Bhavesh Patel. Azeem Qamar. Aanand L. Rai. Himanshu Sharma. Shashikant Sinha.

Production Eros Worldwide.
